title: Portugual and lack of maritime technology

content.question: Which of the following factors best explains why the Portuguese did not engage in direct trading relations with West African states until the fifteenth century?

choices.label: Lack of the necessary navigational and maritime technology
Lack of European interest in African goods
A prohibition on external trade by the Islamic states of North Africa
Directives from the pope to limit Christian trade with Africa
Fear of dying from tropical diseases

content.answer: Lack of the necessary navigational and maritime technology
